wikipedia_page.main: Harold Howell Meredith "Drummer" Thomas (17 August 1883 – 10 February 1947) was a Welsh international forward who played club rugby for Swansea and Llanelli. He won just a single cap for Wales.

response: *Harold Thomas (activist) (born 1947), Indigenous Australian artist and land rights activist
*Harold Thomas (rugby) (1914–1989), Welsh dual-code international rugby union and rugby league footballer
